verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
It's 6 A.M.; I'm so tired.
The alarm sounds; a new day begins.
Before I go and disturb this peaceful moment,
I look to You.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
I want to say a prayer
Before my feet can hit the ground.
Lord, I give this day to You.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I'm amazed how you forgive me.
Yesterday seems so far behind.
It's a brand new day, and every day's a new beginning.
I look to You.

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Breathe in. (I breathe in)
Breathe out. (I breathe out)
Breathe in and watch the day begin.
I wanna watch the day begin.

verse.name: b2
verse.lines: I give this day to you.
